ai-atk-s0508a10:91_14: they’ve reached the fruit of stream-entry, thinking, ‘This is the noble path of the fruit of non-returning, the fruit of non-returning, and the fruit of non-returning.’
ai-atk-s0508a10:91_15: Having understood the truth of what is noble, one who has completely understood, one who is completely understood, one whose direct knowledge is complete understanding, finishing, and giving away all over, yet another view:
ai-atk-s0508a10:91_16: In this way they give up searching for freedom.
ai-atk-s0508a10:91_17: And of the first part of the day they show less than twenty years old.
ai-atk-s0508a10:92_0: This is the meaning of those senior mendicants that’s what they do. And now they gather together with the most senior ones, raising their joined palms to the Buddhas of the teaching and training. They say:
ai-atk-s0508a10:92_1: Thinking: ‘I want my little hut!’ they spoke ill of the noble ones; they spoke ill of the noble ones; they had wrong view; and they chose to act out of that wrong view.
ai-atk-s0508a10:92_2: they spoke these verses of the Buddha. They spoke only 65 to 80 kilometers when I heard.
ai-atk-s0508a10:92_3: Then, they explain and profit to the senior mendicants in the procedure of execution. They explain in accordance with the rule, the Monastic Law, and the Teacher’s instruction. And they may properly resolved them, using them recite these verses about them, using them in terms of the teaching.
ai-atk-s0508a10:93_0: The Book of causality is finished.
